sensor_fusion.real_time_requirements: Complete perception pipeline <100ms, critical path <50ms for emergency braking

architecture_recommendations.preferred_approach: Centralized domain controller with heterogeneous compute: dedicated NPU for AI inference (400+ TOPS), specialized DSP clusters for radar processing, high-bandwidth ISPs for camera preprocessing, and ARM cores for sensor fusion algorithms
key_trade_offs: Centralized vs distributed: Higher bandwidth requirements but better fusion accuracy
Power vs performance: 4D radar and 8K cameras drive significant compute needs
Cost vs capability: Premium features require expensive high-performance SoCs
critical_bottlenecks: Thermal management in compact automotive enclosures

confidence_rationale: Requirements are based on current industry trends from major OEMs and Tier 1s, validated by actual deployment timelines. The 4D radar transition and 8K camera adoption are well-documented industry directions with specific compute requirements published by leading suppliers like Continental and Bosch.
